description:
It's been over a year since Christina disappeared off our radar. Over a year of just doing glamor bondage, bikini shoots and other such vanilla offerings.

Christina missed the hardcore bondage, she missed the male domination, she missed being manhandled, taken and used. But thats all over now and she is back.

We are proud to present Christina Carter, back from exile, and offer one of Hogtied's classic "Real Time" shoots. This type of shoot can only be seen at Hogtied. No cuts, no edits; one continuous take. Everything that makes this a real BDSM experience in front of you with nothing hidden.
title: Christina Carter is Back!
